preview.subtitle: We are Luno, we will create a dream website for you.

aboutHome.title: ABOUT OUR
aboutHome.text: We create premium websites and design projects. Our development experience spans more than five years, during which we have successfully delivered many unique projects.
aboutHome.text2: We write code exclusively with cutting‑edge technologies from 2023–2025. No PHP or other outdated solutions!
aboutHome.text3: We take a unique approach to every task: fully bespoke solutions at minimal market prices using our own tools.

process.title: PROCESS OF
process.subtitle: INTERVIEW
process.text: We conduct an interview with you to clarify project goals and your wishes, and we also propose our own ideas and implementation features.
process.text2: We prepare the structure and craft a technical specification so we have a clear roadmap to follow.
process.text3: Based on the technical specification, our designers create several iterations of a unique design tailored to your project.
process.text4: Once the design is approved, we begin developing the site—both FRONTEND and BACKEND. AFTER COMPLETING DEVELOPMENT, WE LAUNCH THE SITE TO PRODUCTION.
process.text5: Before launch, we thoroughly test the site at all stages. We fix bugs, check functionality, responsiveness, loading speed, and proper operation on different devices and browsers.
process.text6: After successful testing, we deploy the site to the server, handle complete setup and integration. We guarantee that the project will work flawlessly from the first minutes after publication.
process.subtitle_disclaimer: It is important to realize that the process may vary, depending on your preferences!
process.subtitle_speed: We always try to make it fast!

whyus.title: WHY WE
whyus.subtitle_reason: There`s a reason for all of this!

order.title: ORDER
order.text: DREAMS OF A WEBSITE THAT IS NOT ONLY COOL LOOKING, BUT ALSO ACTUALLY WORKS ON YOUR BUSINESS?
order.text2: WE ARE READY TO BRING YOUR IDEA TO LIFE!
order.text3: CONTACT US FOR A FREE CONSULTATION, AND LET'S CREATE A PROJECT THAT WILL NOT ONLY SUCCEED BUT ALSO BRING JOY TO YOUR CLIENTS.

contacts.title: LET'S START A
contacts.input5text: We want to develop an online store with design!
contacts.subtitle: contacts

toast.success: MESSAGE SENT! WE WILL CONTACT YOU IN THE NEAREST TIME.
